put.description: Updates an existing voucher by its id.
Updates an existing user by his id.

patch.description: Updates the hot status of a voucher by its id.
Bans user by the provided DTO.

get.description: Returns paged list of all vouchers. Request can include a 'keyword' parameter to try to find a voucher by name or description.
Returns paged list of all selected vouchers.
Returns default list of all vouchers
